altTitles.en: The Servant Is the Demon King?!

altTitles.vi: Đại Quản Gia Là Ma Hoàng

description.en:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)
description.pt-br: O protagonista é um imperador mágico e o homem mais forte vivo, ele é traido pelo seu subordinado e é morto, após isso ele reencarna em um menino sem cultivo e começa a trilhar seu caminho para a vingança.

title.en: Kimi Janakya Dame na Dorei Shoujo

altTitles.ja: 君じゃなきゃダメな奴隷少女

altTitles.th: ทาสสาวของผมคนเดียวเท่านั้น

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi ja Nakya Dame na Dorei Shoujo

description.en: Daito's your average high-school kid. After getting home one day, he finds a strange girl sleeping on the floor—only to find out she's a slave from another world. He decides to take her in so she can start life anew as a normal girl, beginning their sweet-but-unusual life together as they navigate cultural barriers.

altTitles.vi: Rockman - Chiến binh thế giới ảo

altTitles.ja: ロックマンエグゼ

description.en: The year is 200X, an age where everything is covered with computer networks, and everyone in the world has a "PET" mobile terminal. Hikari Netto, a grade school student at Akihara Elementary, is in perfect harmony with his NetNavi, Rockman, and is obsessed with Net Battles. But then, he gets caught up in an incident involving World Three (WWW), a criminal organization that stages cyber-terrorist attacks. Finally, the Ministry of Science is taken over, and Netto's father is taken hostage. In order to save his father and stop WWW's plan, he confronts the Dream Virus, the most powerful computer virus fused with the "Ultimate Program."

Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”
description.fr: Dès que Gu Changge s’est rendu compte qu’il avait transgressé un monde imaginaire, le protagoniste de ce monde, l’élu de la fortune, a juré de se venger de lui. Envié par tous, non seulement la femme principale est folle de lui, mais il est également traité comme un invité de marque partout où il va. Heureusement, le prestige et le pouvoir de Gu Changge sont supérieurs à ceux de tous les autres, alors il ne devrait pas être facile de piétiner un simple élu de la fortune ?
description.id:
Begitu Gu Changge menyadari dia telah masuk ke sebuah dunia fantasi, protagonis dunia itu yang dengan beruntungnya terpilih, bersumpah untuk melakukan balas dendam terhadapnya. Semua orang sangat iri pada Protagonis itu, karena bukan hanya karakter utama wanita tergila-gila padanya, tapi dia juga selalu diperlakukan sebagai tamu kehormatan kemanapun dia pergi. Untungnya, martabat dan kekuatan Gu Changge jauh melebihi milik orang lain, sehingga dia tidak dengan mudah jatuh di tangan orang yang hanya terpilih karena keberuntungannya?

 

Tunggu dulu… ada sistem yang didedikasikan untuk meraup dan mengambil dari apa yang dimiliki protagonis? Gu Changge tersenyum. “Sepertinya takdir pun ingin aku memenuhi takdirku sebagai orang jahat di dunia ini!”
description.pl: Gu Changge zostaje przeniesiony do świata wuxia, gdzie z miejsca staje się obiektem nienawiści protagonisty, będącego Wybrańcem Losu, gdyż nie dość, że główna bohaterka rzuca mu się w ramiona, to jeszcze jest przez wszystkich traktowany niczym znamienity gość. Na szczęście jego postać cechuje znacząca siła, więc powinien bez trudu zmiażdżyć jakiegoś w czepku urodzonego dzieciaka, prawda? “Chwila… Otrzymałem wyspecjalizowany system, który pozwala mi okradać głównego bohatera ze szczęścia?” Gu Changge uśmiechnął się znacząco. “Zdaje się, że moim przeznaczeniem jest podążanie ścieżką prowadzącą do stania się największym czarnym charakterem w tym świecie!”
description.ru:
Гу Чангэ попадает в фэнтези-мир, где, по-классике, оказывается в шкуре главного козла отпущения.
Удивительно, что главный герой сразу же снизыскал расположение у императрицы, чем вызвал бурю ненависти в свой адрес. К счастью, Чангэ - уважаемый человек в городе и единственное, что его спасает от кары в данной ситуации это высокий статус в обществе. Подождите-ка... а вы уже знаете, что здесь есть необычная система рангов, в которой присутствуют яркие герои всех мастей? Проанализировав события, герой понимает, что выгоднее всего вжиться в свою новую роль и пойти по пути персонажа-злодея!
description.pt-br: Imediatamente após Gu Changge perceber que havia transmigrado para um mundo de fantasia, o protagonista do mundo, e o escolhido da fortuna, jurou se vingar dele. Invejado por todos, ele não só tem a liderança feminina de ponta-cabeça por ele, mas também é tratado como um distinto convidado onde quer que vá. Felizmente, o prestígio e o poder de Gu Changge são superiores aos de todos os outros, então não deveria ser fácil pisar em uma mera escolha da fortuna? Espere … Existe um sistema dedicado à ordenha e colheita do protagonista? Gu Changge sorriu. “Parece que até o destino quer que eu cumpra meu destino como o vilão deste mundo!”

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

description.en:
Josh, who is unemployed, takes home on a whim a bundle of answer sheets he sees at a found object collection center. He meets a girl, Mika Nagasaki, who is looking for the bundle, and through his involvement with her and the people around her, he comes face to face with the love he himself is dragged into.

---
Note: Includes an oneshot called Neko Sagashi.
description.pt-br:
Josh, que está desempregado, leva para casa, por capricho, um envelope com provas respondidas que vê em um departamento de achados e perdidos. Dessa forma, ele conhece a Mika Nagasaki, uma garota misteriosa que está procurando o envelope e, por meio de seu envolvimento com ela e com as pessoas ao seu redor, ele acaba se encontrando em uma situação inusitada.

Observação: Inclui um oneshot chamado Neko Sagashi.

altTitles.ja: カイカンドウキ

description.en:
WARNING: NTR IN LATER CHAPTER

Niwa Tasuku working at Sanden Printing Company for 2 years now but still can't get along at all with with Yukino Tsumugi, a female colleague at the DTP department. Their colleagues try to 'break the ice' by inviting them out for drinks but later that night, they ended up in a love hotel. A strange "connection" is made between these two, one that would 'link' them during the most private thoughts and moments!
description.ru: Нива Тасуку работает в полиграфической компании «Sanden» уже 2 года, но до сих пор не может поладить с Юкино Цумуги из издательского отдела. Коллеги пытаются сблизить их, пригласив выпить, но этой же ночью они оказываются в любовном отеле. Между ними возникает странная «связь», которая «соединяет» их в самые интимные моменты!
description.es-la: Niwa Tasuku ha trabajado en Sanden Printing Company durante 2 años, pero todavía no puede llevarse bien con Yukino Tsumugi, una colega del departamento de DTP. Sus compañeros intentan "romper el hielo" invitándolos a tomar unas copas, pero más tarde esa noche, terminaron en un motel. Se hace una extraña "conexión" entre estos dos, ¡una que los 'vincularía' durante los pensamientos y en los momentos más privados!

altTitles.ja: 恋文と１３歳の女優

altTitles.en: A Love Letter and a 13-Year-Old Actress

description.en:
Fumi Isshiki works as an accountant at an entertainment agency. One day, he is transferred to the management department, where Ayano Haga, a 13-year-old child actress, seems to take a liking to him...?

She is just a child, yet she acts more mature than most adults.
A dramatic story woven between a professional child actress and her manager!

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)
description.ja: 芸能事務所で経理として働く一色文は、ある日営業へと部署異動を言い渡される。担当するまだ13歳の子役の少女、羽賀文乃は、妙に文のことを気に入ったようで…？

altTitles.ja: チュートリアルが死ぬほど難しい

description.en:
Lee Hojae had given up his life as a pro gamer, until one day he received a mysterious message: 

"Congratulations! You’ve been invited to the Tutorial World."

Intrigued, he enters the game and confidently chooses Hell difficulty, but soon learns that he is trapped there. With a mere 0.01% survival rate, Hojae must somehow overcome the game’s agonizing challenges to figure out the real reason he was invited.

This tutorial may be tough, but its secrets are what’s truly hellacious.
description.ja:
元プロゲーマーの堂山海は、ある日突然「チュートリアル」という名の異空間に招待された。 軽い気持ちで最凶クラスの難易度「ヘル」を選択してしまった彼は、離脱不可能、生存率ほぼゼロの「死にゲー」に挑むことになってしまった。 殺伐としたこの世界で生き残るために課せられたミッションをクリアしながら、チュートリアルに秘められた秘密を解き明かしていく。

gandara 퓨전 판타지 장편소설 '튜토리얼이 너무 어렵다' 가 웹툰으로 독자 여러분을 찾아갑니다.

삶이 무료하던 어느 날, 내 눈앞에 나타난 초대 메세지. 
[튜토리얼 세계에 입장하시겠습니까?] 

그리고 뒤이어 나타난 난이도 선택 창. 
[이지] [노말] [하드] [헬] 나는 주저없이 헬 난이도를 선택했다. 

그리고 후회했다. 

아무리 헬 난이도라지만, 이건 너무 심하잖아.

Однажды, посреди серых скучных будней, перед глазами появляется уведомление. [Вы хотите пройти обучение?]

За ним сразу же вылезло окно выбора сложности. [Лёгкая] [Обычная] [Сложная] [Адская]. Я без колебаний выбрал адскую сложность.

И пожалел.
Знаю, она называется адской, но это слишком.

altTitles.ja: 魔男のイチ

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!

title.en: Shut Up, Evil Dragon! I don't want to raise a child with you anymore

altTitles.zh: 闭嘴恶龙我不想再跟你带孩子了

altTitles.en: Shut Up, Malevolent Dragon! I Don’t Want to Have Any More Children With You

description.en:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...
description.id: Setelah dikalahkan dan ditangkap, Dragon Slayer Leon menjadi tawanan Silver Dragon Queen. Dengan kesadaran akan kematian, dia menggunakan sihir terlarang untuk mengutuk sang ratu, tetapi secara tak terduga, sang ratu kehilangan kendali. Dia berpikir bahwa ini akan membuat sang ratu hidup dalam rasa malu seumur hidupnya, dan itu akan sepadan dengan misinya sebagai pemburu naga. Namun, dua tahun kemudian, ketika Leon membuka matanya, di sampingnya ada seorang gadis kecil naga dengan ekor...

altTitles.ja: シュガーガール・ドリップ

description.en: Marie, a sparkling university student who craves validation, takes up a part-time job at a concept cafe for their uniforms. There, she meets Akira, a spontaneous and unpredictable person. Their meeting sets off a chain of events that changes Marie's life, and they end up spending time together as…accomplices!? An overdose of desire begins in the neon-glowing sleepless city!!
description.ja: 承認欲求あふれるキラキラ大学生インフルエンサーのマリーは制服目当てでダイナーのコンセプトカフェでバイトをすることに。そこで地雷系キッズのアキと出会ったことで、人生を一変する大事件を起こし、共犯者としてともに過ごすこととなり…!?　ネオン輝く眠らない街で欲望のオーバードーズが始まる!!

title.en: Kono Isekai de, Unmei to Tsugau - Juujin α wa Yasashiu Kedamono

altTitles.ja: この異世界で、運命と番う～獣人αは優しいケダモノ

altTitles.es-la: Se llama destino en este otro mundo

altTitles.en: It's called destiny in this other world
In This Other World, I'll Meet My Destiny - Beastman α Is a Kind Beast

description.en:
"I'm glad you're my destiny."
One day, Haru of Ω woke up in an oasis in the desert and felt a trembling sensation all over her body when she saw a black beastman appearing in front of her. In a situation where he has lost his memory and does not even know his own name, Viano, the α, who is the leader of the black panther tribe and who himself summoned Haru, speaks gently. "This is a world ruled by beastmen, and it's the turn of fate for me and Haru." Haru, who knows this world and spends his days with Viano, feels an irresistible passion and emotion. However, Haru, who cannot conceive Viano's child no matter how much she wants, finally puts herself in a dangerous situation...and remembers. The memories of his former world and the meaning of losing those memories -...
description.es-la:
"Me alegro de que seas mi destino". 
Un día, Haru (Ω), se despierta en un oasis del desierto; al ver frente a él un hombre bestia negro, siente que todo su cuerpo tiembla. Había perdido la memoria y ni siquiera sabía su propio nombre, pero Viano (A) que era el jefe de tribu de las panteras negras y que él mismo había convocado a Haru, le habló con dulzura: "Este es un mundo dominado por los hombres bestias y tú eres mi destinado".
En los días que Haru pasa con Viano, se hace muy consciente del irresistible calor y las emociones que siente. Por mucho que quiera Haru, no puede concebir el hijo de Viano, y finalmente, cuando Haru se pone en una situación peligrosa... recupera su memoria.
¿Cuál es el significado de haber perdido esos recuerdos de su mundo pasado?

altTitles.ja: ワンピース

description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!

description.en: Armed with his new weapon, the Dashinben, Taikobo seeks revenge on the demon Dakki and her sinister sisters. He finds out much more about the godlike Sennins--and what may have really happened to his clan. But looking for survivors only means falling further into Dakki's darkness.

altTitles.ja: ナイトメア・メーカー

altTitles.ja-ro: Sekai wa Subete Kimi no Mono

description.en: Uchida is a high school student genius who created a device that is supposed to make people have good dreams but he always had bad dreams when he tried it on himself. One day, he caught the school doctor sleeping at the clinic and decided to try the device on her. It turned out that it works surprisingly well on her and that she wanted to buy the device from him. He then tries it on his classmates and it became quite popular with the rest of the class as people start lining up to borrow it. Meanwhile, there is growing concern that users of the device are starting to have difficulties differentiating dreams from reality…
description.ja: 天才発明家高校生の内田は､夢に願望を投影できる夢見装置を開発｡誰もが装置の虜になっていく､レム催眠誘導型リアル体感システム始動!!

title.en: The Return of the 8th Class Mage

altTitles.en: The Return of the 8th Class Magician

altTitles.it: Il ritorno del mago di VIII classe

altTitles.ja: 8クラス魔法使いのやり直し

altTitles.th: การกลับมาของจอมเวทระดับ 8

altTitles.es-la: El Retorno Del Mago De 8th Clase

description.en:
As a powerful 8th class mage, Ian Paige took countless innocent lives under the orders of Emperor Ragnar, a close friend and ruler of the Greenriver Empire. Yet despite their closeness, Ragnar views Ian as a threat and subsequently poisons him. 

Using time magic, Ian saves himself and returns 30 years to the past. Now a young boy, Ian joins an elite order of mages to hone his abilities once again.

 This time, he’ll get revenge on the emperor who betrayed him and reclaim glory as an 8th class mage!

---

description.id:
Sudah bertahun-tahun sejak aku menodai tanganku untuk Kerajaan Bersatu dan kaisarnya, Ragnar. Saya ingin kembali ke kampung halaman saya dan menjalani kehidupan yang tenang seolah-olah bertobat dari dosa-dosaku. Namun, “Kamu adalah penyihir kelas 8 yang hebat yang mampu menggulingkanku dan kekaisaran kapan saja” "Bagaimana aku bisa membiarkan monster sepertimu tetap hidup?" Setelah dikhianati di ambang kematian oleh Ragnar, yang adalah temanku sekaligus Kaisarku, aku menusuk jantungku dengan belati yang memiliki sihir waktu yang diterapkan padanya. “Penebusan yang ku inginkan adalah mengembalikan semuanya ke tempatnya.”

description.it:
Dopo decine di anni passate in sanguinose guerre l'imperatore Ragnar incontra il suo vecchio amico, ritiratosi ad una vita di solitudine e esilio nella città natale, nell'intento di espiare i propri peccati. Ad un mago potente sarà concesso il lusso di ritirarsi in esilio? Con un tradimento ha fine una lunga amicizia. Però, prima che la morte sopraggiunga, esiste la possibilità di rimediare ad ogni peccato. Attraverso un balzo nel tempo di oltre 30 anni il potente mago cercherà di ribaltare le sorti del futuro.

description.ko:
황제 라그나르와 통일 제국을 위해 손에 피를 묻히길 수십 년.
나는 고향으로 돌아가 속죄하며 죽은 듯이 살고자 했다.

그러나,

“자네는 언제든지 나를, 나의 제국을 집어삼킬 수 있는 8클래스의 대마법사.”
“그런 괴물을 어찌 살려둘 수가 있겠나?”

친구이자 주군이었던 라그나르에게 배신당하고 죽음의 문턱을 넘기 직전,
시간 마법의 주문이 새겨진 단검을 심장에 찔러 넣었다.

‘내가 원했던 참회란, 모든 것을 되돌려놓는 것.’


인류 최초의 8클래스 마법사 이안 페이지.
그가 30년 전 과거로 돌아왔다.

description.ru:
История рассказывает об Иане Пэйдже, архимаге и первом человеке, который прорвался через уровень шестого класса, а затем и седьмого, став самым могущественным магом восьмого класса.

После целой жизни, состоящей из войн и убийств, он сумел окончательно объединить континент. Состарившись, единственными его желаниями стали стремление прожить остаток жизни в мире и попытки найти спасение от горестей, привнесённых пролитой им кровью. Тем не менее его старый друг, обезумев от паранойи, не мог спокойно сосуществовать рядом с кем-то настолько сильным и предал Иана, убив его.

На последнем издыхании Иан использовал магию времени, которая переместила его в прошлое, в то время, когда он был маленьким мальчиком. Имея при себе все свои знания из прошлого, Иан решил сделать нечто большее, чтобы просто прожить жизнь с меньшим количеством сожалений.

---

Yıllarca Birleşik İmparatorluk ve kralı Ragnar için ellerimi kana buladım.

Günahlarımdan arınmak için memleketime dönüp huzurlu bir şekilde yaşamak istedim.

Ancak…

“Yüce bir 8. Sınıf büyücü istediği zaman beni ve imparatorluğu bırakıp öylece gidebilir mi?”

description.uk:
Багато років я проливав кров за Сполучену Імперію та її правителя, Рагнара. Я хотів лише повернутися в моє рідне місто і прожити тихе життя, спокутувати свої гріхи. «Як можу я залишити в живих такого монстра?» Відданий і залишений Рагнаром, моїм колишнім другом та імператором, вмирати, на порозі смерті я пронизав своє серце кинджалом, наповненим магією часу. «Бажане мною відкуплення – це повернення на своє звичне місце».

altTitles.pt-br: Posso amar minha esposa que quer fazer todo tipo de coisa?

altTitles.en: We Started A So Sweet Newlywed Life

description.en: There's the flower of Takamine High, Hanae Riko, whom every boy admires. Then, there's the plain boy, Niiyama Minato, who got proposed to by that most beautiful girl in school. Without knowing what's happening, the curtain on their newlywed life rises! For some reason, my bride, who's too cute and happily follows me around everywhere, refuses to leave my side...
description.ja:
「わ、私を……っ、あなたのお嫁さんにしてくれませんか……？」　学園一の美少女・花江りこに逆プロポーズされ、わけのわからないうちに、りことの共同生活を始めた俺。だけど、うぬぼれてはいけない。これは契約結婚。――そのはずなのに、「なんでそんな尽くしてくれるんだ？」と尋ねたら、彼女はむうっと頬を膨らませて「湊人くん、ニブすぎだよ……」と言ってきた。え……俺たちがしたのって契約結婚でいいんだよな……？　交際ゼロ日婚からはじまる、ひたすら幸せなだけの両片想いラブストーリー☆

"Wa, watashi o…… ~tsu, anata no o yomesan ni shite kuremasen ka……?" Gakuen ichi no bishōjo Hanae Riko ni gyaku puropōzu sa re, wake no wakaranai uchi ni, Riko to no kyōdō seikatsu o hajimeta ore. Dakedo, unuborete wa ikenai. Kore wa keiyaku kekkon.―― Sono hazunanoni, "nande son'na tsukushite kureru nda?" To tazunetara, kanojo wa mū tto hoho o fukurama sete "Minato hito-kun, Nibu-sugida yo……" to itte kita. E…… oretachi ga shita no tte keiyaku kekkonde ī nda yo na……? Kōsai zero-nichi kon kara hajimaru, hitasura shiawasena dake no ryō kataomoi rabusutōrī ☆
description.pt-br: Hanae Riko, a garota mais bonita da Takamine High, que todo garoto admira. Niiyama Minato, um garoto simples, que foi proposto em casamento por essa mesma garota. Sem saber o que está acontecendo, as cortinas de sua vida de recém-casados ​​sobem! Por alguma razão, minha noiva, que é muito fofa e me segue alegremente por toda parte, se recusa a sair do meu lado...

altTitles.en: I Have an Apocalyptic Underground City

description.en:
A Female President? Then come help me manage the shelter. A Female Special Forces Soldier? Then come and be the captain of the guards.   
At the end of the world, titles like CEOs, beautiful women, secretaries, electricians, programmers and all other professions are all no longer useful. Don't be afraid to come to my underground system shelter- as long as you are talented people and human beings!   
  
5 consecutive updates will be launched after February 16.

In Gyeongseong, the city of glittering lights and glamorous desire, Gyeongseong Detective Agency has opened its doors at No. 45, District 1, Myeongchijeong. Sohwa, a 16-year-old servant girl, has nothing to her name but her wits and bravery. When she accidentally gets caught up in a secret scheme, she meets Jeong Haegyeong, a young man running his own detective agency. Chased by memories from the past, they must work together to clear her name.

altTitles.ja: キングダム

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

description.en: Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!

title.en: The Code to the Evolutionary Spiral

altTitles.es-la: El Código de la Espiral Evolutiva

description.en: In 2024, mankind's insatiable appetite finally opened the Pandora's Box of technology, releasing the long-sealed demonic seeds and catalyzing the process of life's evolution. The irresistible catastrophe instantly annihilated the entire human civilization, leaving behind only the scorched earth of steel and iron, a symbol of the former prosperity, and the survivors who lingered on top of it. In this chaotic world of collapsed order and crumbling faith, can humanity unite to rebuild civilization? In this devastated wasteland, the heroes representing various forces pass a number of tests to complete their own redemption and finally embark on a difficult journey to find the truth of the end times.

altTitles.es: El Retorno del Gran Mago Después de 4000 Años

description.en:
Lucas Trowman was the greatest archmage in history until he was condemned by Demigod to spend eternity losing his mind. But 4,000 years later, he’s thrust back into this world, into the body of Frei Blake, the weakest, most un-talented student at the prestigious Westroad Academy for mages. After all this time, the world of magic has barely progressed. Could this be the work of Demigod? Determined to find out, Lucas seeks to reach the highest levels of power once again and get his revenge.

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/4000%EB%85%84-%EB%A7%8C%EC%97%90-%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98%ED%95%9C-%EB%8C%80%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%82%AC/2385)
- [Official Indonesian Translation (Kakao)](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Kembalinya-Sang-Archmage-Setelah-4000-Tahun/3441)
- [Official Japanese Translation (Piccoma)](https://piccoma.com/web/product/37285)
- [Official French Translation (Delitoon)](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/retour-grand-mage)
- [Official Thai Translation (Kakao)](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B1%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%87_4000_%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%B5/10)
description.es: El peor estudiante de la Academia Westrod, la desgracia de la Casa Blake. Una nueva alma entra en el cuerpo sin vida de Frey Blake, el niño que no pudo manejar su vida dolorosa y eligió la muerte en su lugar. “¿Qué pasa con este cuerpo? Tendré que comprobar cada pequeño detalle de ello. El gran mago Lucas Traumen. ¡Se ganó la oportunidad de vengarse ganando la carne y los huesos de Frey Blake la desgracia! ¡Y ahora comienza la interesante aventura del Gran Mago que regresó después de 4000 años!
description.fr: Il redeviendra le maître des étoiles ! Dans ce monde où les dieux règnent et les humains sont doués de magie, le plus grand mage est condamné aux enfers après avoir défier les dieux. Des milliers d’années plus tard, il est réincarné dans le corps d'un jeune ado de l'académie de magie qui vient de mettre fin à ses jours après de longues années de brimades… Par le biais de cette nouvelle vie, il est prêt à prendre sa revanche !
description.id: Lukas Trowman adalah archmage terhebat dalam sejarah sampai dia dikutuk oleh Demigod untuk menghabiskan waktu yang kekal dengan kehilangan akal. Tapi 4.000 tahun kemudian, dia didorong kembali ke dunia ini, ke dalam tubuh Frey Blake, siswa terlemah, paling tidak berbakat di Akademi penyihir bergengsi, Westroad. Setelah sekian lama, dunia sihir hampir tidak berkembang.  Mungkinkah ini ulah Demigod?  Bertekad untuk mencari tahu, Lucas berusaha untuk mencapai tingkat kekuatan tertinggi sekali lagi untuk membalaskan dendamnya pada Demigod.
description.ja: フレイ・ブレイクは魔法学校ウエストロード・アカデミーの劣等生で、名門家紋ブレイク家の恥と言われていた。学校では陰惨なイジメを受け、家では父親からの無慈悲な宣告。つらく苦しい人生に絶望したフレイは、自ら命を絶ってしまう。しかしその瞬間、彼の肉体に新しい魂が宿る。「なんだ？この軟弱な体は？ゼロから鍛え上げないとだめだな…」その魂の正体は4000年前、神を自称する存在"デミゴッド"との戦いの末、奈落の底に封印されてしまった"大魔道士ルーカス·トロウマン"だった。劣等生フレイ・ブレイクの肉体を器にし蘇った、彼の痛快な復讐劇の幕が上がる！
description.ko:
웨스트로드 아카데미의 열등생, 블레이크 가문의 수치.
괴로운 삶을 이기지 못해 죽음을 선택한
프레이 블레이크의 몸에 새로운 영혼이 깃든다.
 ​
“뭐야, 이 몸뚱이는?
하나부터 열까지 손 봐야겠군.”
 ​
대마도사 루카스 트로우맨.
 ​
열등생 프레이 블레이크의 육체로 복수의 기회를 얻다!
 ​
4000년의 시간을 넘어 귀환한
대마도사의 화려한 액션이 시작된다!
description.ru:
Студент академии Вест Роуд и позор семьи Блэйк…  
Не сумев вынести тяготы жизни, Фрэй Блэйк выбирает смерть - и его тело обретает новую душу великого архимага Лукаса Троумэна.  

-Чье это тело? Я должен рассмотреть каждый палец.  
Наконец-то физическая оболочка Фрэя Блэйка получила шанс на месть!  
Возвращение великого мага спустя 4000 лет и начало невероятной истории!
description.th:
ลูคัส โทรว์แมน มหาจอมเวทผู้ยิ่งใหญ่ถูกเดมิก็อดลงโทษเนื่องจากท้าทายพระเจ้า
หลังจากถูกกักขังอยู่ 4000 ปี อยู่ๆ เขาก็ได้มาอยู่ในร่างของนักเรียนขี้แพ้ เฟรย์ เบลค
ผู้ถูกเรียกว่าความอัปยศแห่งเวสต์โร้ดอะคาเดมี และถูกรังแกจนต้องเลือกปลิดชีวิตตนเอง
มหาจอมเวทผู้แข็งแกร่งจะใช้ชีวิตในร่างอ่อนแอนั่นอย่างไร และความแค้นที่สะสมร่วม 4000 ปี จะถูกชำระได้สำเร็จหรือไม่?

description.en:
One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world."

However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Ema, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!
description.es:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.ja:
ある日、青柳明人のクラスにシャーロット・ベネットが留学してくる。
清楚で上品な振る舞いと可愛らしい容姿のシャーロットに、クラスメイトの誰もが心を惹かれるが、
明人は冷静に「住む世界が違う」と感じ、一歩引いていた。

しかし、迷子になっていたシャーロットの妹・エマを助けたことで明人の日常は激変し…！？
description.pl:
Pewnego dnia Charlotte Bennett trafia do klasy Aoyagi Akihito. Jej właściwe i wyrafinowane maniery oraz uroczy wygląd podbiły serca jego kolegów z klasy, ale Akihito spokojnie robi krok do tyłu, czując, że „żyje w innym świecie”.

Jednak pomoc zaginionej siostrze Charlotte, Emmie, wywraca jego codzienne życie do góry nogami...?
description.es-la:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, Charlotte Bennett foi transferida para a turma de Aoyagi Akihito.

Seus maneirismos adequados e refinados e aparência adorável conquistaram os corações de seus colegas de classe, mas Akihito calmamente dá um passo para trás, sentindo que ela “vive em um mundo diferente”.

No entanto, ajudar a irmã perdida de Charlotte, Ema, coloca sua vida diária em uma convulsão...!?

description.en: One day, a picture book writer named Yorozu Hikaru was asked by his close online friend, Chintarou, if they could share a room together while he attended a nearby university. Although they only knew each other through online interactions, Hikaru agrees to it without much thought. However unbeknownst to Hikaru, Chintarou, despite having a male name, is actually a girl: a very well endowed girl.
description.es-la:
Un día, a un autor de libros ilustrados quién se llama Yorozu Hikaru, su amigo cercano de internet, llamado Chintarou, le pidió que le compartiera un cuarto en su casa, en lo que atendía la universidad. 
A pesar de que solo han interactuado en línea, Hikaru acepto sin pensarlo dos veces. Sin embargo y para su sorpresa, Chintarou, a pesar de tener un nombre masculino, es en realidad una chica: Una chica muy atractiva.
description.pt-br: Um dia, um escritor de ilustrador de livros chamado Yorozu Hiraku foi convidado pelo seu amigo próximo, Chintarou, se eles pudessem dividir um quarto juntos enquanto ele frequentava uma universidade próxima. Embora eles só se conhecessem através de interações online, Hikaru concorda com isso sem pensar muito. No entanto, sem o conhecimento de Hikaru, Chintarou, apesar de ter um nome masculino, é na verdade uma menina: uma garota muito bem dotada.

altTitles.ja: ふたりソロキャンプ

description.en:
Kinokura Gen loves camping solo. He enjoys the quiet solitude away from the hustle and bustle of the city, and being able to appreciate nature all by himself. But on one camping trip, his solitude is broken by the appearance of Kusano Shizuku, a young woman who wanted to go solo camping by herself, but is ill-prepared and completely out of her league. While he tries to to get her to go home so he can camp in peace, she refuses, and stubbornly insists on accompanying him on future camping trips until she's ready to camp solo. Thus Gen and Shizuku's days of solo camping together begin.

**Note**: "Part 1" concluded in February 2023 with 3 extra chapters due to start in April as the series is moving magazines from Kodansha Evening to Kodansha Morning.

The series resumed its publication in December 2023.
description.es: A Kinokura Gen le encanta acampar solo. Disfruta de la tranquila soledad lejos del ajetreo de la ciudad, y de ser capaz de apreciar la naturaleza por sí mismo. Pero en un viaje de campamento, su soledad se ve interrumpida por la aparición de Kusano Shizuku, una joven que quería ir sola a acampar, pero está mal preparada y completamente fuera de su alcance. Mientras él intenta que ella regrese a casa para poder acampar en paz, ella se niega, y tercamente insiste en acompañarlo en futuros viajes de campamento hasta que esté lista para acampar sola. Así comienzan los días en que Gen y Shizuku acampan juntos…
description.ja: オレは樹乃倉厳。34歳。趣味はキャンプ。独りで野営する生粋のソロキャンパー。車はいらない。電車を乗り継ぎ、最後はバスで山に入る。自然を愛してる、火を木を水を土を。それと同等に孤独な自分の生き方を愛している――。…な俺が！　ひょんなことから草野雫20歳という小娘に出会い、ふたりでソロキャンプをするはめに！

altTitles.ja: 4コマ勇者

description.en:
The Hero has defeated the Demon King! But the Princess he meant to save turned out to be a Prince. NEETdom, here he comes, but a life of relaxation surrounded by animes is a pretty sweet deal.  
  
Unfortunately, he gets caught up in millennia old legends, curses, and a twisted plot involving multiple Kingdoms and many dragons. Through and through, though, he'll follow a path of whimsy, even if that involves him palling it up with "villains".
description.ru:
Самая обычная история, в которой самый обычный герой убивает самого обычного сатану. С него падает самый обычный журнал 18+. Самый обычный герой, немного полистав его, идёт спасать самую обычную принцессу, которая оказалась самым обычным принцем. Что же будет делать наш самый обычный герой?

---

(Source: yagami)

「ひびき…お前、また太った？」

“食べること”が大好きな女子高生紗倉ひびきは友人の一言をきっかけにダイエットを始めようと決意する！！運動を一人では続けられない彼女が入会したのはスポーツジム！！そのジムで同級生でお嬢様の奏流院朱美と出会うのだが…！！
description.ru: Сакура Хибики - обычная старшеклассница, любящая покушать. Однажды ее подруга замечает, что Хибики поднабрала вес. Огорченная сим фактом, девушка пытается похудеть самостоятельно, но безуспешно. Решив раскошелиться ради великой цели, она направляется в спортзал, где встречает Мисс совершенство, по совместительству президента студсовета своей школы, Сорюин Акэми (у которой, как оказалось, есть небольшая странность). Теперь им вместе предстоит заниматься совершенствованием своих тел под надзором красавчика-тренера Матио.

altTitles.ja: 嘘喰い

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

description.en:
This Spinoff Manga has content based starting from Volume 4 of the Light Novel.

Against the odds, the little slime Rimuru has established Tempest, his magical country for all monsters, and it’s thriving. Three visitors, Phos the fox girl, Stella the dragon girl, and Nemu the winged girl, come to pay Tempest a visit, and they’re stunned at just how quickly it’s developed.

description.de:
Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

altTitles.ja: 四姉妹は夜をおまちかね

altTitles.zh-hk: 精靈四姐妹夜夜待笙歌

altTitles.ja: 四姉妹（エルフ）は夜をおまちかね

altTitles.en: The Four Sisters (Elves) Wait For The Night

description.en: Who will you “play” with tonight—? A sweet and sugary harem romantic comedy about sleeping with elves ♡

altTitles.en: Mortal Life of the Celestial Emperor

description.en: Three years ago, Yun Qing Yan accidentally fell into the Immortal Realm from the Mortal Realm. After three thousand years, Yun Qing Yan became the great Emperor Yun of the Immortal Realm. Breaking through the barrier between the two realms, Yun Qing Yan discovered that only three years had passed. "Before, I was too weak to protect my loved ones. Now, I'll make the whole world bow before me."
description.fr: Il y a trois ans, Yun Qingyan est accidentellement entré dans le monde immortel. Et après trois mille ans passés dans ce monde, il a pu devenir l'empereur des nuages ​​immortels. Yun Qingyan a pu retourner dans son monde en créant une incision dans le vide. Il n'avait aucun pouvoir auparavant pour protéger ceux qu'il aimait, maintenant qu'il est revenu, il veut faire ramper le monde entier sous ses pieds et établir un contrôle sur le monde toute entier.

altTitles.en: The Chaotic God of Extraordinary Strength

description.en: All Jeong wants is a second chance -- for revenge! His grandfather’s gruesome death has transformed him into the bloodthirsty and ruthless Scythe Demon. He will stop at nothing until he has killed the man responsible. Yet rage and determination alone are not enough. He must train in martial arts if he ever wants to stand a chance against such a formidable foe. Will he succeed in his revenge on the murderer of his grandfather?
description.pt-br:
Desde que era um menino, Noor queria ser como os aventureiros das histórias de seu pai — matadores de dragões, quebradores de maldições, heróis que sempre salvam o dia. Mas, como todos sabem, para ser um aventureiro, é preciso ter as habilidades certas!

Infelizmente para Noor, sua [Parry] é completamente inútil, suas perspectivas são inexistentes, e todos que ele conhece estão dizendo para ele desistir. Diante dessa dura realidade, ele percebe que só há uma coisa a fazer: compensar isso com esforço! Um intenso regime de treinamento solitário deve resolver. Se um ano não for suficiente, ele treinará por cinco! Se não forem cinco, dez!

Agora, ao final dos seus vinte e poucos anos, sem novas habilidades para mostrar pelo seu trabalho árduo, Noor decide se tornar um aventureiro mesmo assim, determinado a tentar uma última vez para realizar seu sonho. Ele pode não saber nada sobre aventuras, mas não é estranho ao trabalho duro!

Agora, se ele apenas conseguir descobrir por que todos continuam olhando para ele daquele jeito..

description.en:
"You’re its prey the moment you touch it." 

One day, a terrible virus variant attacks Seoul! 

Yeon-woo is on a school trip to Seoul, and is excited thinking that he can finally get along with his one classmate, So-yeon, whom he has a crush on.

However, during this time, unidentified cells appeared in front of Yeon-woo’s class, who were sightseeing in Seoul. The mutant cells manifestation quickly turns Yeon-woo and his classmates’ school trip into hell as anyone who comes into contact with the cells will become a hideous monster that wants to consume anything with flesh...! 

Will Yeon-woo be able to leave Seoul safely?
description.pt-br: Yeon Woo está apaixonado. Ele não tem olhos pra mais nada além da So Yeon. Na escola ele não conseguiu falar com ela, mas agora que eles estão indo pra uma excursão escolar em Seoul, ele tem esperança de conseguir pelo menos começar a conversar com ela, mesmo apesar de ser muito introvertido. Porém, tem coisas estranhas acontecendo em Seoul… Algo terrível está prestes a dominar a cidade… Nesse dia, Seoul de repente é…?

title.en: The Martial God Who Regressed Back to Level 2

altTitles.en: The God of War Who Regressed to Level 2

altTitles.es-la: El dios marcial que regresó al nivel 2

description.en:
[NO. 4212: 'Humanity' has failed the Demotion Match.]
[NO. 4212: ‘Humanity’ has been deemed useless. Beginning deletion.]

Earth lost the fight for survival in the BattleNet system and humanity now faces eradication. However, Jihan Seong is given another chance. He has returned three years into the past before BattleNet became a life-or-death game.

With his knowledge of the future, he’s determined to become the strongest player. Will Jihan be able to change the fate of humanity? And more importantly, can he protect the ones he loves from those who want him to fail?

title.en: To Those of You for Whom Even Regret Is a Luxury

altTitles.en: For Those of You For Whom Regret Is a Luxury

description.en:
My younger sister became a great soprano through a song I wrote, had an affair with my husband, and my husband said it was all my fault. The moment I was dying at the hands of my family who deceived me, a second life miraculously obtained. I decided to get everything right from the beginning.

“A cheating wife. It's tempting. “You look like fun, you.”

I decided to borrow the power of this man, who was called a vicious murderer, and begin my revenge.

altTitles.ja: 地雷なんですか？地原さん

altTitles.en: That Girl Is Cute… But Dangerous?

altTitles.pt-br: Aquela Garota é Bonita, Mas Perigosa?

description.en: The girl sitting next to me at the start of the new semester is the rumored "landmine" girl… but… is Chihara-san really the "landmine" that everyone says she is?
description.pt-br: A garota sentada ao meu lado no começo do novo semestre é a famosa Garota Perigosa, mas… a Chihara-san é mesmo o “Perigo” que todos dizem ser?

altTitles.en: Time Slip of the Fist King

description.en:
In a world where humans enslave other races, the archmage ‘Laefenhart’ is treated as the Demon King by the humans for his sins of helping the other races. 

A group of Heroes came to subdue the Demon King! ‘Laefenhart’ succeeds in causing great damage to the Hero party, but ends up being in danger of being killed by the Fist King, ‘Tesron’…

“Space-Time Return Spell.”

The magic spell cast as a last resort miraculously succeeds and sends ‘Laefenhart’ to the past. However…

I became one of the Heroes, the Fist King, ‘Tesron’, who had the strongest body on the continent?!

The archmage ‘Laefenhart’, with his newly acquired physical strength, changes the world with new powers!

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhi You Wo Neng Yong Zhao Huan Shu

altTitles.en: Only I Can Use Summoning SSS-Rank Lone Summoner

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhǐ Yǒu Wǒ Néng Yòng Zhào Huàn Shù

description.en: Zhang Ze crosses over to a parallel world where people rely on the Magic Domain to fight monsters and become stronger to resist the invasion of demons from the Devil’s Cave. For the sake of his sister, Zhang Ze enters the magic realm under the name of Asura, and then he unexpectedly awakens the strongest SSS-level talent summoning ability! The higher the level of the summoning art, the more monsters you can summon, and the more you can upgrade, it’s simply heaven-defying!

Seongwu is a former special forces soldier who has returned to college after completing his national service. His ordinary life as a student is shattered during class one day when he and his fellow students are faced with a mysterious prompt asking them to “select a role.”

Seongwu chooses the necromancer, a rare ability that grants him the power to control the undead.

With the campus and outside world seemingly on the brink of collapse, Seongwu must use his newfound powers to battle fearsome monsters and help save his fellow students. But will they make it out alive?

description.fr:
"Quel est le métier le plus utile pour survivre dans un monde en ruine ?". Cette question apparaît devant Seong-woo alors qu'il somnole en cours. Lui et les autres étudiants ont 15 secondes pour choisir une carte parmi celles qui sont apparues devant eux. Celle choisie déterminera leurs pouvoirs qui leur permettront de survivre dans un monde chaotique, qui ressemble fortement à un jeu vidéo. Pour sa part, Seong-woo sera un nécromancien !

곧 세상이 멸망한다.
전설 속에나 나올 법한 몬스터들이 각지에 출현한다.
그리고 사람들을 잡아먹고, 길거리를 점령하며, 빌딩과 지하철에 던전을 만들기 시작한다.

멸망한 세계에서 살아남기 위해 단 한 가지 직업을 고를 수 있다.
당신은 무슨 직업을 고르겠는가?

나에게는 멸망이 무대이고, 죽음이 자산이 된다.

description.ru:
Мир на грани разрушения. Существа, упоминания о которых встречались лишь в мифах и легендах, теперь заполоняют города, обживаются под людскими жилищами и в метро, пожирая всё живое.
А что до человечества… Ему будет предложено занять новую роль в нынешнем мире выживания.
Сонву выбрал класс «некромант», и теперь трупы, что обагряют Землю, ему только на руку.

魔物侵袭，世界灭亡在即！
退役特种兵的降维打击！
某一天，只存在于传说中的魔物们突然出现，肆意地破坏街道、撕咬人类，并且在高楼和地铁建立起了自己的巢穴…如果在灭亡的世界，能够选择一个职业，你会选择哪种职业呢？对于身为“死灵法师”的刘成宇来说，灭亡即是舞台，丧生即为资产。

description.en:
Jung Hyunwoo is just an unlucky gamer barely making ends meet in the VR game "God Wars." He even ends up losing access to his game account due to a horrible accident and is forced to create a new character. 

In the process, he discovers that he has an ability that allows him to see hidden information in the game, which leads him to become a Grand Warlock. 

Now equipped with a mind-blowing skill and a legendary class, all that's left is for him to level up and go from zero to hero...

'재능'도, '돈'도, '운'도 없던 정현우.

감전 사고에 당하고부터 게임 속 보이지 않아야 하는 것들이 보이기 시작했다.

altTitles.ja: みつどもえ

description.en: The somewhat precocious and sadistic girl Mitsuba, the somewhat lecherous muscle girl Futaba, and the somewhat mysterious gloomy girl Hitoha. Better known as the (mischievous) "Marui Sisters," this is the story of how these triplets go about their days in Class 6-3 with their cute yet wild antics.

Gajun and Seonwoo are second-years at Shinhae High School, an exclusive school for students with special abilities. While on a school trip, they miss the bus during a brief stop at a rest area. After a series of twists and turns, they manage to board another bus and head to the training center with an uneasy feeling.

When they finally arrive, they are confronted by their friends dying at the hands of suspicious people. Just before he dies, Gajun finds himself waking up on the same bus heading to the training center.

The school trip keeps repeating.

After experiencing several deaths, Gajun realizes that the cause of the time loop is Seonwoo's death, and he becomes increasingly overprotective of him. Meanwhile, Seonwoo, who is weaker than Gajun, is puzzled by Gajun’s overprotectiveness and tries to protect him in return...

“Trust me, I'll protect you no matter what."
